summary: Three generations of a family coming together over a weekend. A sick mother's wish to die before her disease worsens gets harder to handle as old conflicts come to the surface.
cast: Ghita Nørby|Paprika Steen|Danica Curcic|Morten Grunwald|Pilou Asbæk|Jens Albinus|Vigga Bro|Oskar Sælan Halskov
title: Corazón silencioso
